name: Unstable Signal
description:
One day you realize that everything around is not quite real. In fact, you got stuck in the old analog game console. The output video signal is very unstable and looks like it could be used as a back door for escape. Good luck mate!

Tnx to Snabisch for the awesome track.

Pixelized post-effect was taken from Post Process Shader Pack v1.2 Tom Shannon LLC (Epic Store Marketplace) 

Cube TV RGB  post effect was made with a help of this video

This project was made  approximately in 10 hours straight after the other jam.

It's some sort of tribute to the cycle of my recent unfinished projects, burnouts, laziness, and creative void. 

I am cured, Moving on!
